entities.description: The use of tobacco, alcohol, or drugs by an individual.
A condition in which the use of substances leads to clinically significant impairment or distress.
Psychological or emotional conditions such as depression or anxiety.
Services or interventions aimed at treating mental health issues.
The financial situation or socioeconomic status of an individual or household.
The highest level of education attained by an individual.
A geographic area located outside towns and cities, typically with low population density.
The basic physical systems of a community, including transportation, communication, sewage, water, and electric systems.
Laws, regulations, or guidelines intended to influence or control behavior.

relationships.description: Indicates that an individual engages in the use of substances.
Indicates that an individual has a substance use disorder.
Indicates that an individual experiences a mental health issue.
Indicates that an individual receives treatment for mental health issues.
Indicates the economic status of an individual.
Indicates the highest level of education attained by an individual.
Indicates that an individual resides in a rural area.
Indicates that an individual's living conditions are affected by the available infrastructure.
Indicates that substance use is regulated or influenced by certain policies.
